0: RESOLUTION TO URGE THE PHILHEALTH TO EXPAND THE COVERAGE OF DIALYSIS IN THE LIST OF DISEASES AND AILMENTS COVERED BY ITS HEALTHCARE PROGRAM, WITH THE END IN VIEW OF MAKING A MORE COMPREHENSIVE DIALYSIS TREATMENT PROGRAM
